languages.text: Виде{mf|л|ла} Домин среди них карту Судии, что выносит суждение, взвешивает и отделяет повинное от невинного.
Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Judge, who weighs and separates guilt from innocence, and passes his verdict.
languages.original_text: Виде{mf|л|ла} Домин среди них карту Судии, что выносит суждение, взвешивает и отделяет повинное от невинного.

traits.locale_text: Among them, the Enim saw the card of the Judge, who weighs up and separates guilt from innocence, and passes his verdict.
Among them, the Enim saw the card of the Judge, who weighs up and separates guilt from innocence, and passes his verdict.
Among them, the Enim saw the card of the Judge, who weighs and separates guilt from innocence, and passes his verdict.

Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Judge, who weighs and separates guilt from innocence, and passes his verdict.
Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Judge, who weighs and separates guilt from innocence, and passes his verdict.

languages.text: Unter ihnen sah {mf|der|die} Domin die Karte des Richters, der Schuld und Unschuld abwägt und sein Urteil fällt.
languages.original_text: Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Judge, who weighs and separates guilt from innocence, and passes his verdict.

traits.locale_text: Unter ihnen sah {mf|der|die} Domin die Karte des Richters, der Schuld und Unschuld abwägt und sein Urteil fällt.

languages.text: Entre ellas, {mf|el|la} Domin vio la carta del Juez, que sopesa y separa la culpa de la inocencia y luego dicta sentencia.
languages.original_text: Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Judge, who weighs and separates guilt from innocence, and passes his verdict.

traits.locale_text: Entre ellas, {mf|el|la} Domin vio la carta del Juez, que sopesa y separa la culpa de la inocencia y luego dicta sentencia.

languages.text: ドミンはその中に、有罪か無罪かを判断して評決を下す、ジャッジのカードを見た。
languages.original_text: Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Judge, who weighs and separates guilt from innocence, and passes his verdict.

traits.locale_text: エニムはその中に、有罪か無罪かを判断して評決を下す、ジャッジのカードを見た。

languages.text: 在无数圣牌之中，秘者看到了仲裁者的圣牌。仲裁者会区分有罪之人与无罪之人，也已经做出了判决。
languages.original_text: Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Judge, who weighs and separates guilt from innocence, and passes his verdict.

traits.locale_text: 在无数圣牌之中，秘者看到了仲裁者的圣牌。仲裁者会区分有罪之人与无罪之人，也已经做出了判决。

languages.text: {mf|Le|La} Domin vit la carte du Juge, qui rend son verdict après avoir pesé la culpabilité et l'innocence de chacun.
languages.original_text: Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Judge, who weighs and separates guilt from innocence, and passes his verdict.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le|La} Domin vit la carte du Juge, qui rend son verdict après avoir pesé la culpabilité et l'innocence de chacun.

languages.text: Domin, kartların arasında Yargıç'ı gördü. O ki ruhu tartandır. O ki masumu suçludan ayırıp hüküm verendir.
languages.original_text: Among them, the Domin saw the card of the Judge, who weighs and separates guilt from innocence, and passes his verdict.
